user_story.so_that: bring an issue for decision by the Members

whens_list: I go to the Resolutions page
I select "Other proposal" from "Type of proposal"
I enter the text of the resolution
I press "Open this proposal for electronic voting"
thens_list: I should be on the Resolutions page
I should see the new resolution in the list of currently-open resolutions

whens_list: I go to the Resolutions page
I select "Other proposal" from "Type of proposal"
I enter the text of the resolution
I press "Save this proposal as a draft"
thens_list: I should be on the Resolutions page
I should see the new resolution in the list of draft resolutions
